com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage.databaseObjects

Class Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage.databaseObjects.Lesson

  • public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
    Using this class to represent Lesson and Note objects which are read from the database.\n Each Lesson object is consist of an lessonId, a lessonTitle and a set of lessonContent ids.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Allen Cheng Yu-Lun
